title: HTTP Login Audit
description:
The HTTP login is like a flimsy lock on the café's back door—if Metasploit can pick it, any hacker could waltz right in! Let's turn the tables and test it ourselves, then fortify it like a digital fortress.

Objective: Become the exploit master! Use Metasploit's auxiliary modules to test the HTTP login, expose the weaknesses, and lock it down tighter than a bank vault.
dialogue: Mira: "Whoa, if Metasploit can just stroll through the HTTP login like it's no big deal, we're in trouble! Let's test it and turn it into an impenetrable wall."
Mira: "You're the exploit expert—fire up msfconsole and show me how we'd break in, then we'll fix it so no one else can!"
Mira: "This is like being a spy testing the enemy's defenses—super cool!"
hints: Metasploit's auxiliary modules are your secret gadgets—use http_login to probe the endpoint.
Launch msfconsole, load the module, set your targets, and let it do the dirty work!
Once you find the weak spots, patch them up—maybe add authentication or rate limiting.
